PageWidgetPortable.Title: Por família
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>TR_ESTADOTRIBUTOSALIQUOTAS.FAMILIA.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.FAMILIA IS NOT NULL) AND (A.FAMILIA IN (SELECT FAMILIA.HANDLE FROM PD_FAMILIASPRODUTOS FAMILIA WHERE FAMILIA.HANDLE = A.FAMILIA AND FAMILIA.EMPRESA IN (@EMPRESA))) AND (A.PRODUTO IS NULL) AND (A.ESTADOORIGEM = @CAMPO(ESTADOORIGEM)) AND (A.ESTADODESTINO = @CAMPO(ESTADODESTINO)) AND (A.IMPOSTO = @CAMPO(IMPOSTO)) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2718_at4479_hsf7719ec.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Por produtos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>TR_ESTADOTRIBUTOSALIQUOTAS.PRODUTO.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.FAMILIA IS NOT NULL AND A.PRODUTO IS NOT NULL AND A.ESTADOORIGEM = @CAMPO(ESTADOORIGEM) AND A.ESTADODESTINO = @CAMPO(ESTADODESTINO) AND A.IMPOSTO = @CAMPO(IMPOSTO) AND A.PRODUTO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM PD_PRODUTOS WHERE FILIAL IN @FILIAIS)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2718_at4480_hsbc8f4d42.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
